Job Description: Description:     Must have experience on .Net 4 and above, ASP.NET with C#.     Must possess hands on experience on SQL Server 2008 and above.     Should have hands on experience of WCF, Web Services, MVC, Angular 2.     Should have good knowledge of product build management and practices.     Must have strong Communication Skills with Client interaction experience.     Working knowledge of SQL Server and its variant.     Excellent analytical and logical skills and team player.     Good Knowledge of development life cycle, processes and policies.     Need to be self-driven and ready to take up tasks independently.     Must have very strong concepts of OOPS.     Ability to lead a team.     Must have strong Communication Skills with Client interaction experience.
